job_title:
AI, RAG, NLP, and Knowledge Graph Expert for Complex Implementations

 - Contract to Hire
job_description:
Job Description:

We are a development agency specializing in Flutter and React with a talented team of 10 developers. Our agency is expanding into more complex AI implementations, having previously worked with Large Language Models (LLMs) and vector databases. We are currently seeking an AI specialist with expertise in RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), NLP (Natural Language Processing), fine-tuning AI models, and knowledge graphs.

Responsibilities:

Design and implement AI solutions that meet the complex needs of our diverse client base.

Provide expertise in the areas of RAG, NLP, fine-tuning, and knowledge graphs to enhance our product offerings.

Collaborate with our development team to integrate AI components into existing and new applications.

Guide the team through the AI development lifecycle, including planning, implementation, testing, and deployment.

Assist in problem-solving and debugging AI-related challenges.

Requirements:

Proven experience in AI, with a focus on RAG, NLP, fine-tuning, and knowledge graphs.

Strong understanding of AI principles and how to apply them in real-world applications.

Experience with AI model development, deployment, and maintenance.

Ability to work collaboratively with a team of developers.

Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.

Qualifications: Proven experience in AI, with a focus on RAG, NLP, fine-tuning, and knowledge graphs
Strong understanding of AI principles and how to apply them in real-world applications
Experience with AI model development, deployment, and maintenance
Ability to work collaboratively with a team of developers
Responsibilities: Design and implement AI solutions that meet the complex needs of our diverse client base
Provide expertise in the areas of RAG, NLP, fine-tuning, and knowledge graphs to enhance our product offerings
Collaborate with our development team to integrate AI components into existing and new applications
Guide the team through the AI development lifecycle, including planning, implementation, testing, and deployment
Assist in problem-solving and debugging AI-related challenges
